system.description:
Not content with the academic study of magic at the feet of other mortals, you have sought out a supernatural tutor to glean additional insights from. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can change your warlock spellcasting ability to Intelligence if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • Half your wizard levels count as warlock levels for determining when you gain access to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.yrcfetjokyci4xk2]{Invocation of the Courts} options.
  • Half your warlock levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of calculating the spell slots you can get back with @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iqlgotutphoratct]{Arcane Recovery}. You still cannot get back spell slots higher than the maximum wizard spell slot level you have access to.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in warlock, 3 levels in wizard
